sub_title: Post-doc at the Netherlands Heart Institute
summary:
I am passionate and dedicated to supporting medical and scientific projects that drive healthcare forward and provide patient treatment options. 

I have successfully revealed pathological mechanisms underlying several acquired and inherited heart diseases and identified regulators that serve as promising drugable candidates for future therapeutic strategies during my PhD training. Currently, I am investigating heterogeneous outcomes among patients with the same cardiac disease and studying potential drugs to improve maladapted hearts.   

My specialties are cardiovascular diseases, omics data, project management, presentation skills, communications, team player, flexibility, solution-focused thinking, and creativity.
